img_above_text:
![Thunderbolt Horn .jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/4/49/Thunderbolt_Horn_.jpg)| Thunderbolt Horn| Uncommon | Using the gourd moderately increases Shock resistance for a short duration | After completing Chapter 2 - Yellow Wind Ridge, it is found at the Shen Monkey Vendor at Bamboo Grove - Marsh of White Mist Shrine in Black Wind Mountain| Thunderbolt Horn
![Black-myth-wukong-stranded-loongs-whisker.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/2/2e/Black-myth-wukong-stranded-loongs-whisker.jpg)| Stranded Loong's Whisker| Epic | Using the gourd moderately extends the duration of the next Immobilize Spell for a short duration | At the Mirrormere Shrine in The New West, walk onto the lake In the far right corner at the back of the lake you can find the Soak in a container | Stranded Loong's Whisker
img_below_text:
![Black-myth-wukong-turtle-tear.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/1/1e/Black-myth-wukong-turtle-tear.jpg)| Turtle Tear| Epic | When at full Health, using the gourd recovers a moderate amount of Mana | Found in North Shore of the Bitter Lake at Bitter Lake in The New West, along the right side of the shore Interact with the skeleton at the back of the area to spawn the Soak back on the shoreline | Turtle Tear
![Black-myth-wukong-tender-jade-lotus.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/e/ea/Black-myth-wukong-tender-jade-lotus.jpg)| Tender Jade Lotus| Rare | Using the gourd slightly increases a small amount of defense for a short duration | Randomly obtained from Jade Lotus plants | Turtle Tear

img_summary: The image depicts a vibrant, coral-like object placed on an ornate dish, likely representing an item from the game "Black Myth: Wukong." In the context of the preceding and following text, it is inferred to be a collectible or consumable item, similar to the Thunderbolt Horn and Turtle Tear, which enhances player abilities or provides specific benefits within the game. This item is likely part of a series of unique objects that players can find and use to gain advantages, such as increased resistance, spell duration, or mana recovery.
